A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By attempting to not be the movie everyone expected\, The Last Jedi fails to be the movie it should have been. It’s enjoyable enough in places\, but too many plot twists inside of plot twists sprinkled with a hefty dose of MacGuffin left me scratching my head at the end. Episode IX should be titled The Last Hope...unless it corrects much of the flaws in Last Jedi and delivers the film we all deserve\, then this third trilogy will ultimately disappoint almost as much as the second trilogy.
